package July2023;

public final class loop {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int a=190;
			while(a>100)
			{
				System.out.println("The value of a is:"+a);
				a=a-10;
			}
			
			
			int b = 10;
			do
			{
				System.out.println("The value of B is:"+b);
				b=b-1;
			}while (b<5);
			
			
		
			
			
			
			
			
			
			
			
			
			
	}

}
